name: Fish Food
description:
My submission for the Barfcade Game Jam.  A simple 2 player game where you play as an angler fish trying to eat as many shrimp as possible and then eat your opponent.  

Eating shrimp makes you grow bigger, but eating sea urchins makes you barf and get smaller.  Shoot the sea urchins.

Game lasts about 30 seconds and quits after someone wins.
